transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+5% Ally Team Attack
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+5% Ally Team Attack
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Melee Weapon: Beam Sword
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nHas a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to gain <color=#28d9ed>Immunity</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color> if the target is inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy.\nHas a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000052_1_1]</color> chance to gain <color=#28d9ed>Immunity</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000052_1_1] turn(s)</color> if the target is inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Firepower Support: Homing Lazer
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies.\nHas a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies.\nHas a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000052_2_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000052_2_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Add-on: Strike Launcher
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies.\nIncreases the <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>1%</color> for each target damaged.
description: Attacks all enemies.\nIncreases the <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000052_3_2]</color> for each target damaged.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>Find Weakness</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Gains <color=#28d9ed>Immunity</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color> if the target is <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>Find Weakness</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000052_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Gains <color=#28d9ed>Immunity</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000052_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color> if the target is <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage

4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
